doc.field: Time Inc. Fortune Publishing and Business Records
Time Inc. Fortune Publishing and Business Records
Series III. Advertising Sales Department Records
Series III. Advertising Sales Department Records

The Advertising Sales Deparment Records contains the Fortune Advertiser Record Cards which are are on microfilm. The dates refer to the original material and not the creation of the microfilm. Each record card contains the magazine issue date for the advertisement, size of ad, if it is in black-and-white or color, and the cost.
